thread.title: SHARON BURMAN
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by SHARON BURMAN

author: SHARON BURMAN
title: SHARON BURMAN
text: we had ordered several items for our bees, One of the tools came broken so we called and were very appreciative that you replaced it immediately with no hassles. All the items were as advertised and or high quality. Thank-you!
